QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: telemetrySave
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Save telemetry Log after each flight
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled a telemetry will be saved after each flight completes.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: telemetrySaveNotArmed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Save telemetry log even if vehicle was not armed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled a telemtry log will be saved even if vehicle was never armed.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: apmStartMavlinkStreams
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Request start of MAVLink telemetry streams (ArduPilot only)

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: saveCsvTelemetry
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled, all Facts will be written to a CSV file with a 1 Hertz frequency.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: forwardMavlinkHostName
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Host name to forward mavlink to. i.e: localhost:14445

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: forwardMavlinkAPMSupportHostName
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Ardupilot Support server to forward mavlink to. i.e: support.ardupilot.org:xxxx
